roleset.name: translate into = be equivalent in effect

example.text: In addition, our data show that the functions performed by these molecules/pathways in promoting cell survival or apoptosis/anoikis translate into complex, differential modulations of individual Bcl-2 homologs.
example.arg: complex, differential modulations of individual Bcl-2 homologs

example.text: Interestingly, this reduction in liver injury failed to translate into improved survival.
Persistent diuretic use results in dynamic changes in ECW and other body fluid compartments that translate into chronic blood pressure reduction.
example.arg: dynamic changes in ECW and other body fluid compartments

example.text: Remarkably, differences between ligands that seem small in the [35S]GTPgammaS binding assay translate into huge differences in the magnitude of Ca2+ responses.
example.arg: huge differences in the magnitude of Ca2+ responses
differences between ligands that seem small in the [35S]GTPgammaS binding assay

example.text: The simple rules governing how local interactions among individuals translate into group behaviors are found across social groups, giving social insects the potential to have a profound impact on our understanding of the interplay between network dynamics and social evolution.
These changes further translate into altered expression levels and time kinetics of a number of early genes (peak expression at 2 h after stimulation).
example.arg: altered expression levels and time kinetics of a number of early genes

example.text: This may translate into faster activation of the muscle fibres, thus partly explaining the increase in power output.
example.arg: faster activation of the muscle fibres
